conversation.message: Hello Parent_C! Thank you for inquiring about our curriculum. We place immense value on holistic development, and integrating creative arts and movement is central to this philosophy. Our approach isn't confined to dedicated 'art' or 'PE' classes; rather, these elements are woven into the daily rhythm. For instance, children engage in daily movement activities, including structured gross motor play and spontaneous dance, which aids in cognitive development and self-regulation. Creative arts—such as painting, sculpting, and dramatic play—are always available, encouraging self-expression and problem-solving skills. We use music and rhythm extensively to teach math concepts and language development. We believe this integrated, hands-on methodology ensures every child learns through movement and creativity. Does this sound like the kind of active, comprehensive environment you are seeking?
